name: Dev Leader Blog Projects
tagline: Projects referred to by my blog, Dev Leader
body:
### Welcome
Thanks for coming to check out the projects that I refer to on my blog, [Dev Leader](http://www.devleader.ca). There are also often referenced on [Code project](http://www.codeproject.com) when my blog posts sync to [Nick's Technical Blog Articles On Code Project](http://www.codeproject.com/script/Articles/MemberArticles.aspx?amid=8784357). If you haven't already, I suggest heading to [http://www.devleader.ca](http://www.devleader.ca) and check out the blog postings that these various projects accompany.

### Cloning
If you want to clone the code to try out the examples, please feel free! You'll want to clone from this repo:

[https://github.com/ncosentino/DevLeader.git](https://github.com/ncosentino/DevLeader.git)

`git clone https://github.com/ncosentino/DevLeader.git`

You can also clone the code from google code if you're more comfortable getting it from there. It's up to you! The repo over there is:

[https://n.b.cosentino@code.google.com/p/nicks-blog-projects/](https://n.b.cosentino@code.google.com/p/nicks-blog-projects/)

`git clone https://n.b.cosentino@code.google.com/p/nicks-blog-projects/`

### Contact & Links
If you want to get in touch, try the following:
* [About.Me](http://about.me/ncosentino)
* [LinkedIn](ca.linkedin.com/in/nickcosentino)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nbcosentino)
* [Google+](https://plus.google.com/107945092100467776036/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
